title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 580.9 - Pre-hearing conferences
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 580.9 - Pre-hearing conferences

State Regulations

The hearing officer may direct the parties to appear for a
conference to simplify, define, limit or resolve issues. The hearing officer
shall summarize for the record the action taken at the conference and any
admissions, stipulations or agreements which were made by the
parties. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
580.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
